QuestData.Title: The Flow of the River
QuestData.Description:
We can leave Farmer Maya in charge of the farmland now that the greatest threat has been reduced.
But we aren't out of hot water just yet, $n. The fisheries are just as important as our fields, and they are in even greater danger than the farm if what Angler Creel says is true.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Angler Creel in Whitewater Wash.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad you arrived when you did. The drogbar are increasing their aggression as we speak.
